notes.text: We now ensure that the binding for the timezone property works correctly
We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
We now correctly set the width of radio buttons
We now ensure that messages are correctly handled when data is copied and pasted from external applications into tables
We now ensure that the notes facet is displayed inside a collection facet
We now ensure that properties are displayed with the correct labels in the p13n personalization dialog
We now ensure messages are shown after saving when sticky mode is used
We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps
You can now use the semanticObject as a path annotation in DataFieldWithIntentBasedNavigation
We now consider filter and sort restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
We've introduced a toggle button on the column selection tab in the table's p13N dialog, to allow users to display description columns when needed
